name: Fatima Khan
summary: Data analyst with a strong finance background and expertise in SQL. Skilled in deriving actionable insights from complex datasets to drive strategic decision-making.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Performed thorough data analysis to identify trends, reduce risk, and optimize investment strategies. Developed complex SQL queries to extract and manipulate financial data.

experience.title: Quantitative Analyst
experience.description: Built predictive models to forecast market trends and assess portfolio performance. Utilized statistical tools to analyze financial data and provide actionable insights to stakeholders.

projects.name: Portfolio Optimization Tool
projects.description: Designed and implemented a tool to optimize investment portfolios based on risk appetite and performance metrics. Used SQL for data retrieval and portfolio analysis.

projects.name: Fraud Detection System
projects.description: Developed a fraud detection system using machine learning algorithms to identify suspicious transactions. Utilized Python, SQL, and Tableau for data processing and visualization.
